basic.Peptide Name: Mastoparan B (MP-B; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.10667861] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus epidermidis ATTC 12228 (MIC=25 µM), Bacillus subtilis PCI 219 (MIC=25 µM), Enterococcus faecium EFMY-28 (MIC=12.5 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli NIHJ JC-2 (MIC=50 µM)
